email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the MV OCEAN HAWK available for your route. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. The starting freight quote is USD 25 per ton. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thanks for the update. USD 25 per ton seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the laycan dates and the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Alex,

The laycan dates are November 15-20, and the demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per ton. Does this meet your requirements?

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 23 per ton sounds more reasonable. Please proceed with the booking as discussed. Could you also send over the vessel's certificates and the last 3 B/Ls for our records?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment - Documents
email_chain.body:
Alex,

All requested docs attached. Let me know if you need anything else to move forward.

Best,
Laura Smith

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf, BL_history.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Documents
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Docs received and reviewed. All looks good. Please proceed with the booking as discussed.

Best regards,
Alex Martin
